text: Zdzisław Żygulski (18 August 1921 - 14 May 2015) was a Polish art historian and professor. He worked at the Academy of Fine Arts in Kraków, Anglicist. He was the curator of the Arms and Armour Section of the Czartoryski Museum from 1949 until his death. Żygulski was born in Borysław, Poland on 18 August 1921. He died in Krakow, Poland, aged 93.ZMARŁ PROF.
